## SessionManager.isHeld() method

Hold state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isHeld(session: Session): boolean | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  session | Session | Session to check. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean \| undefined

## Remarks

True if session media is on hold. Undefined is session doesn't exist.
